entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High 13.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 13. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Showers. Low 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Showers beginning in the evening and ending after midnight then 40 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h before morning. Low 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
